text: Francis Arthur Sedgman (born 29 October 1927) is a former Australian tennis player. He was ranked world No. 1 in 1951. He famously won 22 Grand Slams in singles, doubles and mixed doubles. He retired in 1976. Sedgman was born in Mont Albert, Melbourne, Victoria. He is married to Jean. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Australian tennis players Category:Australian Open champions Category:French Open champions Category:Order of Australia Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne Category:US Open (tennis) champions Category:Wimbledon champions
title: Frank Sedgman
